## Welcome to the MI01 Dashboard Hub

This platform provides comprehensive insights into voting patterns, education, employment, veterans affairs, and demographic trends across Michigan's 1st Congressional District.

---

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
### County Output Dashboard

![](https://img.icons8.com/fluency/96/000000/combo-chart.png){width=64}

Interactive county-level analysis featuring:

- **Voting Results**: County-wide and precinct-level election data
- **Voter Turnout**: 2024 participation metrics
- **Education**: School district performance and boundaries
- **Employment**: Jobs, establishments, and payroll statistics
- **Veterans**: VA spending and services data
- **Demographics**: Age, race, income, and education profiles

## Data Sources

This platform aggregates data from multiple authoritative sources:

- **Voting Data**: County clerks and Secretary of State records
- **Veterans Data**: Department of Veterans Affairs spending records
- **Employment Data**: Bureau of Labor Statistics county business patterns
- **Demographics**: U.S. Census Bureau American Community Survey
- **Geographic Data**: Census TIGER/Line shapefiles

All data is pre-processed and stored in efficient RDS format for fast loading.

---

## Technical Details

:::{.callout-note}
## Deployment Information

- **Platform**: Posit Connect Cloud
- **Source**: GitHub Repository
- **Framework**: Quarto + Shiny for interactive dashboards
- **Entry Point**: `app.R` (Shiny) or this page (Quarto website)
- **Data Storage**: Local RDS files (~620 KB total)
:::
